keyword: how many calories are in busch light
title: How Many Calories Are in Busch Light?
meta_description: Learn how many calories are in Busch Light per 12 oz serving, including carbs, protein, sodium, and full nutrition breakdown for this light lager beer.
h1: How Many Calories Are in Busch Light?
assumptions: Standard 12 fl oz (355 ml) can of Busch Light, American light lager, unopened and chilled; no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by batch, serving size, and brand specifics; alcohol content affects calorie density. Check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One 12 oz serving of Busch Light contains 95 calories, mostly from 3.2 g of carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Switch to regular Busch (higher carb version)

faqs.q: How many calories are in Busch Light per can?
faqs.a: 95 calories in one standard 12 oz can of Busch Light.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Busch Light?
faqs.a: About 3.2 g of carbohydrates per 12 oz serving, with 0 g fiber or sugars.

faqs.q: Does Busch Light have protein or fat?
faqs.a: 0.8 g protein and 0 g fat per serving; it's a low-calorie light beer.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in Busch Light?
faqs.a: Only 10 mg of sodium per 12 oz serving.

faqs.q: Is Busch Light lower calorie than other beers?
faqs.a: Yes, at 95 kcal per 12 oz, it's lighter than many regulars (e.g., 150+ kcal).
